articles.author: Gopika Gopakumar
articles.title: ICICI Bank sees turnaround in business momentum in Q2 - Mint
articles.description: Net profit rose six-fold year-on-year to  ₹4,251 crore for the quarter ended 30 September. The bank, which raised  ₹15,000 crore in August to bolster its capital ratios, has set aside  ₹8,772 crore of provisions for any potential covid impact
articles.content: MUMBAI: Private sector lender ICICI Bank said business momentum re-bounded sharply in the second quarter. Its retail loan book grew 6% sequentially during July-September and 12.8% year-on-year. The b… [+2665 chars]

articles.title: Hyundai registers its best October ever as Creta continues to reign supreme - HT Auto
articles.description: Hyundai has never had an October this good - in terms of cumulative sales - since its India debut..Creta 2020 remains a key product from Hyundai that is powering the car maker in the Indian market.
